CustomField.inlineHelpText: For NMHC Canada: Are your caregivers bonded? If no, does your agency have Police Vulnerable Sector Screening (PVSC) which provides the screening of individuals who intend on working or volunteering with vulnerable people?
CustomField.label: Caregivers are bonded?
